text: Malaya Vilva () is a rural locality (a village) in Alexandrovskoye Urban Settlement, Alexandrovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 12 km south-west from Alexandrovsk. == References == Category:Rural localities in Alexandrovsky District
title: Malaya Vilva
